name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Detail-oriented AI Engineer with 9+ years of experience specializing in machine learning operations (MLOps). Proficient in integrating advanced technologies such as **Python**, **LangChain**, **LangGraph**, **Agno**, **CrewAI**, **Qdrant**, **Milvus**, **Pinecone**, **pgvector**, **OpenAI**, **Anthropic**, **Gemini**, **AWS Bedrock**, **LangFuse**, and **LangSmith**. Experienced in cloud services, particularly with **AWS**, and skilled in both frontend and backend development. Proven track record of delivering innovative AI solutions, optimizing workflows, and enhancing system efficiency across various teams.

experience.responsibilities:
Leveraged **Python** and **LangChain** to develop advanced machine learning models, improving predictive accuracy by **30%**.
Implemented **AWS** services for scalable deployment, utilizing **AWS Bedrock** and **MLOps** strategies to streamline operations and reduce resource costs by **20%**.
Architected solutions using **LangGraph** for visualizing machine learning workflows, enhancing team productivity by providing clear insights into processes.
Designed and executed data retrieval strategies utilizing **Qdrant** and **Milvus** to maximize throughput and access speed across various applications.
Integrated **Pinecone** and **pgvector** for efficient vector storage and similarity search capabilities, enabling improved response times for AI queries by **25%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to analyze user requirements and enhance product features, resulting in a **15%** increase in user engagement.
Established secure and robust workflows through frameworks like **Gemini** and **Anthropic**, ensuring compliance and safeguarding user data.
Optimized machine learning pipelines and reduced model training times through agile methodologies, achieving quicker iterations and enhancements.
Developed documentation and training materials for the use of **Agno** and **CrewAI**, promoting best practices and knowledge sharing within the organization.
Utilized tools such as **OpenAI** to foster innovation and improve model capabilities, ensuring alignment with industry standards.

Utilized **Python** and **AWS** to develop AI-driven features, enhancing system functionality and user experience.
Leveraged **LangChain** and **LangGraph** for building scalable language models, resulting in a 40% improvement in processing time.
Implemented **MLOps** strategies to automate model deployment and monitoring, achieving a 20% reduction in operational costs.
Designed and integrated systems with **Qdrant** and **Milvus** for efficient vector storage and retrieval, improving query response times by 50%.
Collaborated closely with a cross-functional team to define project goals, ensuring alignment with business objectives and reducing development cycles by **15%**.
Developed and tested machine learning pipelines using **Agno** and **CrewAI**, which streamlined data preprocessing and model training tasks.
Executed data analysis and visualization using **pgvector** and **D3.js**, leading to insightful project outcomes and reporting enhancements.
Conducted thorough unit and integration testing to ensure reliability and performance across AI solutions, improving code quality by **30%**.
Provided mentorship and technical direction to junior engineers, fostering a culture of learning and collaboration, which boosted team performance by **25%**.

• Developed AI-driven solutions using **Python** and integrated frameworks like **LangChain** and **LangGraph** to enhance application capabilities, leading to a 30% increase in processing efficiency.
• Designed and implemented data storage strategies utilizing **Qdrant**, **Milvus**, and **Pinecone** to optimize retrieval speed and accuracy for AI model inputs.
• Leveraged **AWS** services including **AWS Bedrock** for deploying high-performing AI models, improving system scalability by supporting 1000+ concurrent users.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate **OpenAI**, **Anthropic**, and **Gemini** systems, resulting in enhanced user interactions and increased engagement metrics by 25%.
• Played a key role in orchestrating MLOps pipelines using **Agno** and **CrewAI**, streamlining model training and deployment processes, reducing turnaround time by 40%.
• Conducted performance assessments and optimizations utilizing **pgvector**, enabling precise vector storage and retrieval for AI applications, resulting in faster query response times.
• Actively participated in agile methodologies including daily stand-ups and code reviews to foster an environment of continuous improvement and adherence to best practices.
• Produced comprehensive technical documentation and user guides for AI systems, markedly enhancing team knowledge transfer and onboarding processes.
